frameDefinitions: A Protagonist has become aware of a possible Danger (a dangerous event or a Dangerous_entity that might participate in an event harmful to the Protagonist) and is ready to engage in an Activity in response to that Danger.
An Entity develops from a Prior_state to a Post_state.
An Entity changes from a Prior_state to a Post_state in a sequence that follows a pre-defined plan, expectation, or model of change.
An Entity is in a state such that it participates in a preponderance of states and events which are desirable for it.
An Entity is well-known among a wide range of people (in general or in a particular domain) for a particular Reason, which may be a behavior, characteristic, or some other associated item.
An Entity comes into existence at a particular Place and Time which may take a certain Duration_of_endstate, have a Cause, or be formed from Components.
frameExamples: All tropps are on high <t>alert</t> for possible intruders following an attack on a nearby compound.
Their offensive armament has <t>developed</t> from short range missiles to long-range ballistic weaponry in a relatively short period .
In the 1920s the peach industry <t>flourished</t> in Upson County.
Shakespeare was <t>famous</t> during his life because he performed in front of Queen Elizabeth I more than anyone else.
Problems may <t>arise</t> whenever an S1 sophont enters the game.
listRoleDefinitions: This role identifies the <fen>Protagonist</fen> who is prepared to undertake some action in response to a <fen>Danger</fen>.
The action that the <fen>Protagonist</fen> is prepared to do.
A dangerous event or situation which teh <fen>Protagonist</fen> is aware of and is ready to respond to.
An entity of which the <fen>Protagonist</fen> is aware and which poses a danger.
The time when the <fen>Protagonist</fen> is on alert to the potential Danger.
The part of the <fen>Organism</fen> which is undergoing biological development.
The living thing whose <fen>Entity</fen> is undergoing development.
The relevant dimension of development.  Usually expressed by an entity-denoting adjective.
The <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Entity</fen> develops.
The location where the <fen>Entity</fen> develops.
The object that undergoes change.
The time at which the progress occurs.
The location where the Progress occurs.
The <t>Entity</t> is experiencing a period of desirable events or states.
This role describes the state of the <fen>Entity</fen>. It is often incorporated into the LUs of this frame.
The <fen>Time</fen> during which the <fen>Entity</fen> thrives.
The <fen>Place</fen> where the thriving takes place.
The <fen>Entity</fen> which is widely known and recognized.
The behavior, attribute, or associated entities that provide the reason for the <fen>Entity</fen> being famous.
The <fen>Time</fen> during which the <fen>Entity</fen> is famous.
The location where the <fen>Entity</fen> is famous.
Concrete or abstract entity that did not exist before the <fen>Time</fen> of the event.
This role identifes the Time when a new Entity comes into existence.
This is the Place where the new Entity comes into being.
listRoleExamples: <fex>Troops</fex> are on high alert following a string of bombings downtown.
You should be on alert <fex>to evacuate within 30 minutes of hearing the siren</fex> .
We were all on guard <fex>for possible attempts to sabotage the operation</fex>.
The development <fex>of a human embryo</fex> is fascinating to study.
Rachel studies nervous system development <fex>in apes</fex>.
<fex>Embryonic</fex> development had been stunted by the disease.
<fex>Someday</fex> this bud will grow into a rose.
The cells were developing rapidly <fex>in the Petri dish</fex>.
Advances <fex>in marketing techniques</fex> have since rendered it obsolete.
<fex>When</fex> did the X-wing progress beyond the drawing board?
In the 1920s <fex>the peach industry</fex> thrived in Upson County.
He was living <fex>well</fex> after his promotion.
<fex>In the 1920s</fex> the peach industry thrived in Upson County.
Why was it that democracy flourished <fex>in America</fex>?
This station is famous <fex>for the many ramen shacks surrounding it</fex>.
Certain people are well known <fex>only in North America</fex>.

sourceCandidateSpans.text: the Economic and Financial Crimes Commission
the same period the year before
